## Government Tender Announcement: Leasing of 55 Portable Two-Way Digital Radios and Associated Services

### Reference Number: cb-361-11094901 Amendment Number: 4 Solicitation Number: CIC-156855-1
#### Publication Date: 2023-10-06 Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-31 13:00:00 Amendment Date: 2023-10-31

#### Expected Contract Duration:
The successful bidder will be required to provide services for a period of 4 years, including all options.

#### Overview

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is seeking a contract for the leasing of 55 portable two-way digital radios and associated services. The goal of this request is to upgrade the aged communication system for CIC's security personnel in the National Capital Region (NCR), ensuring effective communication during emergencies.

#### Key Requirements:

* Provide fifty-five (55) portable two-way digital radios
* Offer associated accessories, including but not limited to: earpieces, charging units, and mounts
* Provide unlimited airtime
* Offer 24/7 technical support for system upkeep and maintenance

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA); Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA); Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement; and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity

* National Capital Region (NCR)
